urls.title: What to do in a flood - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
Do you know how to survive a flood? Survivalist Megan Hine explains the three things you need to know üëá 

Over 5 million UK homes are at risk of flooding. Don't assume it won't happen to you.

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft 

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/PVo9toSHDz

@polkapolkaW13 @acabbie @MarcusxGrant @mariamartak @steve_ren @Photo_Iain @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SpacePootler @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @RBourchier @standardnews @ediz1975 Exactly. The tailbacks on Northfield Avenue tend to be caused by a combination of the pinch-points for on-street parking, buses stopping (at stops or these pinch-points), traffic lights and zebra crossings. The road works have been the cause of the large queues by the allotments.

urls.title: Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission gets to work | Yorkshire & Humberside Climate Commission
urls.description: An independent advisory group, set up to support ambitious climate action in Yorkshire and the Humber, has launched today, 17 March. The Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission brings together a team of climate leaders from across the public, private and third sectors, in the largest regional Commission of its kind in the UK.

tweets.text:
We‚Äôre launching today! üì¢

Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission gets to work supporting ambitious climate action across the region. 

Read all about it: https://t.co/QzLBjbGkVl  

1/ https://t.co/hvvMiJabEg

@polkapolkaW13 @saddleblaze @acabbie @MarcusxGrant @mariamartak @steve_ren @Photo_Iain @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @RBourchier @standardnews @ediz1975 Also Northfield Avenue has always had tailbacks the length of the allotments due to the Lido Junction.  I've always ended up waiting like five cycles of the lights in an E3 or E2.

tweets.text: @saddleblaze @acabbie @MarcusxGrant @mariamartak @steve_ren @Photo_Iain @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SpacePootler @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @RBourchier @standardnews @ediz1975 Northfield Avenue can handle slightly heavier traffic (it's not the constant gridlock that people would have you believe) + 2 cars can pass each other. It's also helped reduce speeding on NA. Give motorists a bit of space on that road and too many put their foot down.

urls.description: Your one stop website for up to date information about flooding, weather and traffic disruptions across the Borough of Calderdale.

tweets.text:
Our Chief Executive @JamesBevanEA has today warned businesses & government that we must reach #NetZero while also becoming more resilient to #ClimateChange: https://t.co/Dejc7QSbmz

For example, we're using more low-carbon concrete in flood defences ‚¨áÔ∏è 

#TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/sdnXtuwL11

St. Aidan‚Äôs washlands on the #RiverAire fills to create a large wetland habitat whilst also providing #flood storage to reduce the risk to communities downstream. Here's Andy checking the penstocks to ensure they operate efficiently during a flood. @EnvAgency @OliverHarmarEA https://t.co/iIdEdixoPm

One of the wetlands created last year in the Rea Brook as part of our REAction project in partnership @Reaseheath and @EnvAgencyMids 

This week there have been 60 snipe on the site

A great result! https://t.co/4WmBQOt7aX

It‚Äôs worth taking 2 minutes to watch this short video on my fabulous @EnvAgency #plastics and #sustainability team‚Äôs brilliant work on the @Plastic_EU project to prevent #plasticpollution. I appear waving with our whole team at the end! https://t.co/sGFkNvhtqD

urls.title: Introducing the Environment Agency and their role in Preventing Plastic Pollution
urls.description: Learn about who is in the PPP project from the Environment Agency and what they hope to achieve through the project

tweets.text: Over the next few months we will be sharing introduction videos from our 18 partners. Kicking off with @EnvAgency  telling us about their many initiatives for the PPP project, from Cornwall to East Anglia: https://t.co/HpwOHxoDSy

urls.title: Landscapes to Lifescapes: How does flooding affect us? | The Flood Hub
urls.description: WELCOME to this collaborative project between Lancaster University, the University of Hull and the Environment Agency, exploring how flooding affects our physical and social environment ‚Äì our ‚Äòlandscapes and lifescapes‚Äô. Landscapes to Lifescapes features many games and videos, including our exciting new 360 virtual reality experience, Help Callum. Enter the exhibition via the ‚Äòvirtual floorplan‚Äô below. You can then follow the suggested route or come back to this floorplan to decide where you want to go

tweets.text: In the #LandscapestoLifescapes exhibition we've brought environmental & social sciences together to explore the causes & consequences of #flooding. Too often these perspectives are falsely separated @TheEPS1 @TheBDMA  @TheFloodHub @EnvAgencyNW #SciComm https://t.co/SZ2uFbrG84

Happy to report that all 5 coypu babies (& mum) are alive and well. They're now teenagers. Spotted 3 of them huddled together, munching on acorns again. Lucky for them that there are lots of oaks. They didn't mind me, but jumped back in the water when a dog approached. https://t.co/IHAb4cejfM

@wiguk @BillGates @EnvAgency @metoffice #NetZero and adaptation are two sides of the same coin. The best climate interventions do both at the same time. Example: the recent Keeping Rivers Cool project, under which  EA worked with partners to plant trees along several of our rivers.

tweets.text: At first sight this looks like a beautiful video of a jewel of a kingfisher. Look again - it's surrounded by sewage debris, sanitary towels, wet wipes ect . This is why we fight for cleaner, sewage free rivers. https://t.co/9msIVQzMdE
British-Islands Weather Moods! https://t.co/clR6ZFQQ8l Thanks to @PhotosWeather @EnvAgency #stormhour #thephotohour

Plans to work towards a carbon neutral Torbay are expected to be agreed next week. https://t.co/YZZv5hVRwg 
Plans include - 
1/3 Sea levels are expected to rise by 1 metre - that's why we're acting now with @EnvAgency  to build a new sea wall to rapidly reduce flood risk. https://t.co/bVWOnq4S9o

@EMorfett @EnvAgency @Jesse_Norman It's important that @WGEnviroAgri @lesley4wrexham @PowysCC @NatResWales are also copied in on this. River death does not respect administrative boundaries, it's a systems thing for those that understand catchments.
